com.RoguePanda.ZAG

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.RoguePanda.ZAG.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicZombie, DroppedItem, FireZombie, GameObject, Player, Projectile

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic Entity, from which all other painted items extend, other than buildings and items
